original_text:
Because of the violence done to your brother Jacob,
    shame shall cover you,
    and you shall be cut off forever.
korean_text: 네가 네 형제 야곱에게 행한 포학으로 말미암아 부끄러움을 당하고 영원히 멸절되리라

sentences.original_text: Because of the violence done to your brother Jacob
sentences.korean_translation: 네 형제 야곱에게 행해진 폭력 때문에

sentences.original_text: and you shall be cut off forever.
